tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_consumption (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    energy_usage FLOAT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_energy_consumption (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE energy_meters (
    meter_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    meter_location VARCHAR(100),
    energy_reading INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE energy_billing (
    bill_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    energy_consumed INT,
    bill_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    billing_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE user_energy_records (
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  provider_id INT NOT NULL,
  consumed_energy DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE billing_history (
  billing_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  provider_id INT NOT NULL,
  consumed_energy DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  cost DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
